column3:
Great calculator. It has really great features especially that I can add 
numbers to all my previous calculations from the history list. It's easy to 
use and comes with a few themes. No ads. I think the only thing missing is 
a little bit of statistics and regression like finding standard deviation...Full ReviewGreat calculator. It has really great features especially that I can add 
numbers to all my previous calculations from the history list. It's easy to 
use and comes with a few themes. No ads. I think the only thing missing is 
a little bit of statistics and regression like finding standard deviation 
and correlation by entering values

I am an engineer by profession. Use this app a lot. Have replaced my 
physical calculator. Best part is that it doesn't have the annoying adds 
like other calc. It would be more better if there are options like solving 
equations and variable options. Hope these changes in next update.

It looks great and does what it does well. I haven't yet found a way to use 
number bases other than 2, 8, 10, 16 and 60 though, and it seems base 60 
only goes to 3 digits. It also seems that in any base other than 10 it only 
deals with integers.

I always find another sci calc but i end up loving this app. It's very easy 
to use. No need to bring calculator since it has the same feature with my 
sharp calc.

Hi! Can you add Statistics functions? Like the Casio Calculators. Will just 
input numbers and then it will compute for the mean, standard deviation 
etc. Thanks!
Engineer here. This hasn't completely replaced my hand calculator, but it is the only thing I use for 99% of all use cases. Great app.

Never thought I would find a better calculator than my ti86. It's now for 
sale on eBay because of this app. Well done from an engineer and scientist.

Excellent Calc app for me. Can I suggest adding engeering suffix, and short 
cut keys? ex: 9e-9 = 9n(display) for entering 9e-9 = 9 + (shortcut key) 
anyway his app is already great!!! Thank you for implementing my request 
reminds me of my college calculator. Great App!!!

Its amazing but there are still some limitations...it can calculate 
factorial of whole number only...not other numbers(real or imaginary)... 
Second limitation is that there are no variables...

Great for simple calculations as well as the more complicated stuff I need 
to do from time to time. I have stopped needing to keep my Casio calculator 
nearby, though I won't retire it.

Excellent if you like RPN. Just a question.. i with haptic feedback off. Is 
they any way to get sounds when the buttons are pressed?

I've never see such soft calculator. Am a teacher by professional. I've 
dumped my physical calculator in a dustbin. No longer need it in my hands.

I like this calculator, it's a real good tool to solve equations. In 
problems, they did a good job making this download.

Its pretty good but unfortunately it doesn't seem to be available in my 
country when i want to buy a pro version. This needs to be fixed somehow

Hi Hiper team i am very thankful to making such a calculator for us. I

Amazing app, combining extensive array of useful functions and library of 
constants with easy to pick up and use interface (also comes with manual if 
you are not familiar with REAL scientific calculators). First thing to 
install for any engineer
Great app ! It can handle complex numbers and that's really useful. And it has lotsa other nice options. Wish I had this machine when I was a student, a very long time ago..

Helping my 13 year old with her math  was so easy. She was learning dividing, multiplying and adding improper fractions and doing time/speed sentences and all she had to do was plug in the variables and bam. Love it. Keep up the good work

I absolutely love this app. It doesn't have any ads and it is very helpful 
when you are working on math problems or just trying to do math for fun 
with yourself. Definitely rate and love this app( usually never say that 
about any aps!!)üíìüíì‚ù§üëåüëçüëç

step?

I love it. I really helps me a lot solving a problem with my classmates. But something's missing. The 'csc' and 'sec' . Please add it for your next update and also please add another theme or arrangement. Thank you really for this wonderful app.

What more can be said. It's a great calculator, with all sorts of bells and 
whistles. I really like the store and memory modes. I have it parked on the 
"edge"of my galaxy 7 edge, so its readily accessible, and after the 
computation, it just ducks back into the hidden edge, leaving the original 
a...Full ReviewWhat more can be said. It's a great calculator, with all sorts of bells and 
whistles. I really like the store and memory modes. I have it parked on the 
"edge"of my galaxy 7 edge, so its readily accessible, and after the 
computation, it just ducks back into the hidden edge, leaving the original 
app on the screen. Great app!

Works great, just like a traditional calculator. I turned off equations to 
make it more intuitive, which conveniently also makes it free. A bit of a 
marketing oversight?

Fantastically full featured, but it desperately needs a textbook display 
option, and it needs to fit more information at the screen at one time (by 
making the number don't smaller). I also find the delete and clear button 
placement very inconvenient, because it is used a lot, but is far from the ...Full ReviewFantastically full featured, but it desperately needs a textbook display 
option, and it needs to fit more information at the screen at one time (by 
making the number don't smaller). I also find the delete and clear button 
placement very inconvenient, because it is used a lot, but is far from the 
bottom of the screen where it is easy to reach.

Love it. It feels like a scientific calculator I am used to. One error I 
noticed is that it does not respect brackets. Try (sqrt(2))√ó600.

Great app to help you solve and understand the problem in a subject you 
will never need beyond high school or college. Ease of operation and the 
full screen display are really good. For basic everyday, real world math _ 
excellent.

Excellent execution! Makes the phone look and feel like a physical calculator, very rich and real in appearance. I could do without the vibration though, not really necessary. Excellent app all the sameüëç

Excellent work! I never rate apps but this is such a great app, a good old 
scientific calculator like back in grade school but on the phone, therefore 
always with you unlike the real one that's in a drawer or trunk of a car 
somewhere.

A great calculator. You might think this strange but I like the reverse 
polish notation option. My first national semiconductor calculator used

It goes as complex as you need it to be. It feels like I actually have a 
full scientific calculator. It's also so cool that I can change the skin to 
look like the calculators I'm used to. It also has a very helpful 
conve...Full ReviewI love this calculator, it can be simple when you want to do simple things. 
It goes as complex as you need it to be. It feels like I actually have a 
full scientific calculator. It's also so cool that I can change the skin to 
look like the calculators I'm used to. It also has a very helpful 
conversion, that I like and is very helpful.
It's a clean scientific calculator that is nothing more but also definitely nothing less than what you might expect from the physical. Intuitive but also powerful, it's a solid download.

To be honest I haven't used it that much but It has done everything I've 
wanted so far. Highly recommended
